plot: A detective poses as a crook to catch the butler who stole an inventor's gun plans.
title: Detective Finn and the Foreign Spies
plot_es: A detective poses as a crook to catch the butler who stole an inventor's gun plans.
original_name: Detective Finn and the Foreign Spies
plot_en: A detective poses as a crook to catch the butler who stole an inventor's gun plans.
